Product.Name: Slim Fit Straight Leg Rocco Jean - White
Product.Description:
These Rocco jeans have attitude, swagger and style. Our slim fit gives a little room with a little edge. With back pocket flaps and enamel hardware details, these white jeans will make a statement no matter where you are.
  • Slim fit, low rise, straight leg
  • Button closure with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with back pocket flaps and stitching
  • White denim with enamel hardware detail
  • 100% Cotton
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Loose Fit Boot Cut Blake Jean
Product.Description:
These looser-fitting jeans have easy, casual style. Our most relaxed cut is just as comfortable as it is cool. Washed for the right look.
  • Low rise, loose fit, boot cut
  • Button closure with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with back pocket stitching
  • Fabric has a touch of stretch to it
  • 98% Cotton 2% Spandex
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Extra Slim Fit Straight Leg Zach Jean
Product.Description:
A vintage-inspired, medium-wash jean in our slimmest fitting shape. This pair will stand the test of time, getting more broken in and faded with each wash. It's a modern take on an American classic.
  • Extra slim fit, low rise, straight leg
  • Button front with zip fly
  • Buttoned coin pocket and back pockets
  • Medium wash jean with nicked and grinding details
  • 100% Cotton
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Slim Fit Straight Leg Rocco Jean
Product.Description:
These Rocco jeans have attitude, swagger and style. Our slim fit gives a little room with a little edge. Our unique dying process ensures that over time this garment will wear in, become softer and its color will fade.
  • Low rise, slim fit, straight leg
  • Button front with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with back pocket stitching
  • Slightly destructed, lightly whiskered, thick stitching
  • 100% Cotton
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Extra Slim Fit Straight Leg Zach Jean
Product.Description:
The opposite of a trend, these jeans transcend fad and settle right into permanent rotation status. Double reinforced back pockets and busted seams ensure comfort and durability. The denim may fade, but the style never will.
  • 100% Cotton
  • Extra slim fit, low rise, straight leg
  • Button front with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with back pocket stitching
  • Clean, washed black denim
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Chronograph Leather Strap Watch - Brown
Product.Description:
A traditional style with a multi-functional face gives you a look that's truly timeless. The crocodile-pattern leather strap and silver-toned details make this piece right for day or night.
  • Case size: 44mm, Quartz Analog Japanese Movement
  • Chronograph face, stop watch feature on side
  • Leather strap, adjustable buckle
  • Nickle-free, lead free, hypoallergenic
  • Water resistant: 3 ATM/30 meters
  • 2 year limited warranty
  • Imported

Product.Name: Chronograph Resin Bracelet Watch
Product.Description:
Lighten up your look with smooth, white resin. Silver-tone details and luminous hour markers make this luxurious timepiece a serious yet simply-styled watch.
  • Watch case: 44mm, Quartz Analog Japanese Movement
  • Chronograph face with date, stop watch function
  • Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release
  • Nickle-free, lead free, hypoallergenic
  • Water resistant: 3 ATM/30 meters
  • 2 year limited warranty
  • Imported

Product.Name: Classic Fit Boot Cut Kingston Jean
Product.Description:
The Kingston jean goes anywhere and goes with anything. Our classic cut is bigger at the ankle to fit your boots. Wear this dark wash for a variety of occasions.
  • 95% Cotton/5% Spandex
  • Low rise, classic fit, boot cut
  • Button front with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with back pocket stitching
  • Dark jean, Midnight Blasted Wash
  • Machine washable
  • Imported
